entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to author action
  • Assignee set to Greg Newby

Thanks for this. I enjoyed reviewing it.

Please add the required boilerplate sections for the OGF copyright and warranty. Use GFD #152 or any recent document as guidance. Once that's done, re-upload (a .docx to this tracker would be good), and we'll get it into public comment.
-- Greg Newby (OGF Editor)

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
Alan Sill wrote:

    Title should be ISOD- not ISOF-

    Fixed

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content: I sent a note to Chin asking for the boilerplate to be fixed, prior to public comment. Also for the document to be uploaded to this tracker.

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• File draft-isod-bcp-infrastructure-v1.5.docx added

Thanks for the comments.

I've added the boilerplate sections as requested and attached a .docx document in this update.

Thanks again!

- Chin

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review

entry.content:

  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Andre to create PDF, put into public comment, hand over to Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content: Forgot to add the note, but this is now in public comment until July 20th.

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• File draft-isod-bcp-infrastructure-v1.5a.docx added
  • Priority changed from Normal to High

No comments were received during public comment period. The GFSG decided to proceed with publication as a Community Practice document, as all of the likely commenters were included int he preparation of the document

During final GFD review on this basis, we noticed and corrected the copyright statement, which was out of date.

THis document is ready for publishing, and has the Area Director and GFSG approval. The Editor should now assign a document number based on the attached version, which changes the document only by updating its copyright statement. Then a PDF version should be prepared from this version and Andre can publish it once this is done.

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

I can prepare the pdf once Greg assigned a number.

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky
  • Priority changed from High to Normal

Thanks for this. It looks like this is GFD-CP.208. Once it's online, I can announce it.
-- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• File draft-isod-bcp-infrastructure-v1.5a.pdf added
  • File draft-isod-bcp-infrastructure-v1.5a.docx added

add GFD number, convert to pdf, ready to publish

entry.title: Editor - document #64: ISOD-RG BCP document submission for public review
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to published
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

This is now published and can be announced.
